flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your Epic Games account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open Epic Games now

steps.content: Go to **www.epicgames.com** and log into your account.
Hover over your avatar icon to expand the list of options and click **ACCOUNT**.
Choose **PASSWORD & SECURITY** from the left-hand menu.
Scroll down and find **Two-Factor Authentication** options. Choose **Two-factor Authenticator App** and click **SET UP**, then **CONTINUE**.

Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it and click **Activate**.

Remember to get your backup codes from Epic Games!
Open Epic Games, hover over your avatar icon to expand the list of options.
Choose **Account**. You will be taken to the **ACCOUNT** click on the Epic Games website. Find and click **Enable Two-Factor Auth**.
Scroll down and find **Two-Factor Authentication** options. Choose **Two-factor Authenticator App** and click **SET UP**, then **CONTINUE**.

Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it and click **Activate**.

Remember to get your backup codes from Epic Games!
In the console, turn on internet browser application, go to **www.epicgames.com** and log in to your account.
Hover over your avatar icon to expand the list of options and click **ACCOUNT**.
Scroll down and find **Two-Factor Authentication** options. Choose **Two-factor Authenticator App**, click **SET UP** and click **CONTINUE**.

Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it and click **Activate**.

Remember to get your backup codes from Epic Games!
